tables.acl_action:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_acl_action` (
  `action_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `module_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `group_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `action_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `comment` varchar(50) DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`action_id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `group_name` (`group_name`,`action_name`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.acl_allow:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_acl_allow` (
  `allow_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `role_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `action_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `value` text NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`allow_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.acl_group:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_acl_group` (
  `group_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `module_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `group_title` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `group_description` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `sort_order` smallint(5) NOT NULL DEFAULT '99',
  `form_class` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`group_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
tables.acl_role:
CREATE TABLE `:table_prefix_acl_role` (
  `role_id` smallint(6) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `role_type` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'user',
  `is_system` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `module_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'core',
  `title` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `parent_role` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `is_super` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `is_admin` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `is_moderator` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `is_staff` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `is_member` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL,
  `is_guest` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`role_id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `role_type` (`role_type`,`title`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
